page.title: 11The Weetch Family Diary
page.content:
Amy's Diary. Easter Bank Holiday Monday. April 8th. 1985.
7.30am. I woke up and went into my parents' room and woke mum up. 7.33am. Mummy and I went downstairs and fed Daisy, our cat, then we laid the table. 8.00am. We all sat down for breakfast. We all had Weetabix and toast. 8.30am. Mummy and Aunty Sue (Mum's sister) went to town and I stayed with Daddy and Rebecca. 8.45am. I got washed and dressed. 9.00am. I watched the 'Wide Awake Club' on the T.V. It was very good even though I didn't see all of it. 10.00am. We went out with Daddy because someone had a leak in their house and Daddy, who is a plumber, had to go and fix it.
